TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchema extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject

summary.span: An in-memory representation of an XML Schema, as specified in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [XML Schema Part 1: Structures](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/) and [XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/) specifications.

span.span: An in-memory representation of an XML Schema, as specified in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [XML Schema Part 1: Structures](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/) and [XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/) specifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > - 不要使用来自未知或不受信任的源或位置的架构。Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources or locations. 这样会危及你的代码的安全性。Doing so will compromise the security of your code. > - XML 架构 （包括内联架构） 的本质上就容易受到拒绝服务攻击;不要在不受信任的情况下接受它们。XML schemas (including inline schemas) are inherently vulnerable to denial of service attacks; do not accept them in untrusted scenarios. > - 由于使用而引发的异常类，如类中，可能包含不应在不受信任的方案中公开的敏感信息。Exceptions raised as a result of using the class, such as the class, may contain sensitive information that should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 例如，属性返回导致异常的架构文件的 URI 路径。For example, the property of an returns the URI path to the schema file that caused the exception. 不应在不受信任的方案中公开属性。The property should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 应正确处理异常，因此在不受信任的情况下不公开此敏感信息。Exceptions should be properly handled so this sensitive information is not exposed in untrusted scenarios. ## Examples 下面的示例创建架构定义。The following example creates a schema definition. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlSchema Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlSchema Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlSchema Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlSchema Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlSchema Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlSchema Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 为前面的代码示例生成下面的 XML 文件。The following XML file is generated for the preceding code example. [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlSchema Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlSchema Example/XML/source.xml#2)]

member this.AttributeFormDefault : System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the form for attributes declared in the target namespace of the schema.

span.span: Gets or sets the form for attributes declared in the target namespace of the schema.

value.span: 值，该值指示是否的目标命名空间中的属性都需要用命名空间前缀限定。

span.span: The value that indicates if attributes from the target namespace are required to be qualified with the namespace prefix.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值必须是下表中所示的值。The value must be one of the values shown in the following table. | 值 Value|描述Description| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------| ||架构中未指定属性窗体。The attribute form is not specified in schema.| ||必须用命名空间前缀限定的目标命名空间中的属性。Attributes from the target namespace must be qualified with the namespace prefix.| ||中的目标命名空间的属性不需要用命名空间前缀限定。Attributes from the target namespace are not required to be qualified with the namespace prefix.| 对于在目标命名空间中声明的所有属性，该值是全局默认值。This value is the global default for all attributes declared in the target namespace. 单独的属性可以重写本地作用域使用此设置`form`属性。Individual attributes can override this setting for the local scope using the `form` attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod BlockDefault { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod get(); void set(System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the attribute which sets the default value of the attribute on element and complex types in the of the schema.

span.span: Gets or sets the attribute which sets the default value of the attribute on element and complex types in the of the schema.

value.span: 值，该值表示阻止派生的不同方法。

span.span: An value representing the different methods for preventing derivation.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `block`属性防止`complexType`或已从正在使用的继承就地派生的指定的类型的元素`complexType`或元素。The `block` attribute prevents a `complexType` or element that has the specified type of derivation from being used in place of the inherited `complexType` or element. 此特性的值可以是空格分隔列表的限制、 扩展和替换，也可以包含的值`#all`或列表，为扩展、 限制或替换的子集。This attribute's value can either be a white space separated list of restriction, extension and substitution or the value can contain `#all` or a list that is a subset of extension, restriction, or substitution. 下表列出可能的值的。The following table lists the possible values of . |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`None`|默认情况下，没有限制的架构中的类型派生。By default, there are no restrictions on type derivations in the schema.| |`Empty`|重写默认派生方法，并允许在架构中的任何类型的派生。Overrides the default derivation method and allows any type derivations in the schema.| |`Extension`|默认情况下，此架构中的元素不能是通过扩展而派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Extension. 仅适用于元素和复杂类型元素。Applies only to element and complex type elements.| |`Restriction`|默认情况下，不能通过限制派生此架构中的元素。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Restriction.| |`Union`|默认情况下，不能由联合派生此架构中的元素。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Union. 仅适用于简单类型。Applies only to simple types.| |`List`|默认情况下，此架构中的元素不能派生的列表。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by List. 仅适用于简单类型。Applies only to simple types.| |`All`|`#all`。`#all`. 默认情况下，该架构中的元素不能通过任何方法派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by any method.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 SOM 引用通过其他命名空间`import`或`include`元素，`XmlResolver`用于解析这些引用。If the SOM references other namespaces through the `import` or `include` elements, the `XmlResolver` is used to resolve these references. 如果冲突解决程序设置为`null`，这表示，用户并不关心解决`import`或`include`元素。If the resolver is set to `null`, this indicates that the user does not care about resolving `import` or `include` elements. 在这种情况下，未解析引用。In this case, the references are not resolved. 后不缓存解析程序`Compile`方法完成。The resolver is not cached after the `Compile` method completes. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法已过时 Microsoft.NET Framework 2.0 版中，已被取代方法。The method is obsolete in the Microsoft .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法使用类来解析外部架构中引用包含、 导入，或默认情况下重新定义元素。The method uses the class to resolve external schemas referenced in include, import, or redefine elements by default. 可以通过传递作为 null 来禁用解析外部架构参数。You can disable resolution of external schemas by passing null as the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值必须是下表中所示的值。The value must be one of the values shown in the following table. | 值 Value|描述Description| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------| ||架构中未指定元素窗体。The element form is not specified in the schema.| ||必须用命名空间前缀限定的目标命名空间中的元素。Elements from the target namespace must be qualified with the namespace prefix.| ||目标命名空间的元素不需要用命名空间前缀限定。Elements from the target namespace are not required to be qualified with the namespace prefix.| 对于在目标命名空间中声明的所有元素，该值是全局默认值。This value is the global default for all elements declared in the target namespace. 各个元素可以使用覆盖此设置为局部范围`form`属性。Individual elements can override this setting for the local scope by using the `form` attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `final`特性防止派生类型元素的指定的类型或复杂类型。The `final` attribute prevents the specified type of derivation of an element or complex type. 此值可以包含`#all`或列表，是扩展或限制的子集。This value can contain `#all` or a list that is a subset of extension or restriction. 下表列出可能的值的。The following table lists the possible values of . |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`None`|默认情况下，没有限制的架构中的类型派生。By default, there are no restrictions on type derivations in the schema.| |`Empty`|重写默认派生方法，并允许在架构中的任何类型的派生。Overrides the default derivation method and allows any type derivations in the schema.| |`Extension`|默认情况下，此架构中的元素不能是通过扩展而派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Extension. 仅适用于元素和复杂类型元素。Applies only to element and complex type elements.| |`Restriction`|默认情况下，不能通过限制派生此架构中的元素。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Restriction.| |`Union`|默认情况下，不能由联合派生此架构中的元素。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Union. 仅适用于简单类型。Applies only to simple types.| |`List`|默认情况下，此架构中的元素不能派生的列表。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by List. 仅适用于简单类型。Applies only to simple types.| |`All`|`#all`。`#all`. 默认情况下，该架构中的元素不能通过任何方法派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by any method.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的此架构中的所有架构组件，以及包含使用任何架构命名空间`include`元素。The is the namespace of all schema components in this schema as well as any schema included using the `include` element. 包括的架构必须让包含的架构相同的目标命名空间，或指定没有目标命名空间。Included schemas must either have the same target namespace as the containing schema or have no target namespace specified.
